data.name: Filtering Cookie
data.description:
Given a cookie from a website login, we want to filter out only useful ones.

Here's the cookie(I know it's freakinshly long):
```
pxro=1; ; geo=US; optimizelyEndUserId=oeu1392912333165366r0.004795793443918228; optimizelyBuckets=%7B%7D; s_ria=Flash%2014%7C; s_vnum_n2_cn=3%7C1; s_vnum_n2_tw=3%7C1; xp_ci=3z4RC4TMzF4Bz4uqzBLjzyVBc06vK; s_vnum_n2_uk=43%7C1; accs=o; site=USA; POD=us~en; dssf=1; ds01_a=51cd2e99c96sdfe76a7a4eed058c1cf35630dc091499586bd8b9d8047b83e6fd7d47ca5fcfc36c0d6c73822da67278039bd269d5ee3e7f8234c0a21937fbd5a0e9270865126f600ca202e29df26a4129c6a614c8e18620a68bf6ab7ce076f0ffb15GZVX; s_orientation=%5B%5BB%5D%5D; s_orientationHeight=674; s_fid=1ED9F78957BC54_21-0F4FE39E703B3D43; dslang=US-EN; s_vnum_n2_us=19|5,4|2,3|1; s_cc=true; s_vi=[CS]v1|2AE1C4DB05012902-400001302000FFBE[CE];  ds01=A19B73A27F7E851DD026613A7ECCD163D6CCD2E83BCD287571400E548000BD63; ; ctitx=eyJleCI6IjIwMTUtOC0yNiAxOjI1OjI0IiwiaXAiOiIxNy4xNTQuMzEuMTk2IiwiY3AiOjMwMDYyMCwiZHMiOjI5OTE0OTE2NX0:rGAPjuylkhjbb5bt4CWu5UMAdK4; NSC_17ofu-jud-jud-mc=ffffffff12920b0645525d5f4f58455e445a4a426ab3; disow=1LndLsIadfhuSRbt1gNIDQKp0; tsniow=368123
```
Passing cookie name will get the `name=value;` pair as a string.

Example:
```
filter_cookie(cookie,"pxro") # "pxro=1"
filter_cookie(cookie,"s_cc", "s_ria") # "s_cc=true;s_ria=Flash%2014%7C"
filter_cookie(cookie, "tsniow", "dssf", "POD") # "tsniow=368123;dssf=1;POD=us~en"
```

The cookie in the test case is same as above.
